column3: A beautiful building, which had its unveiling in 1926. In a lovely Moorish Revival style its profile and facades are wonderful. Stained glass windows are further gorgeous embellishment.With a capacity of around 6300 and an expansive stage, it has hosted many famous artists and performances. Elvis had his first concert here in 1956.It is also a popular movie location including for the 2018 iteration of A Star is Born.
